statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name ILIKE 'Apple%'
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_details
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY transaction_date ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name FROM transaction_details ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name='Amazon' AND amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT merchant_name, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT merchant_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY merchant_name;
SELECT * FROM merchant_details WHERE merchant_type = 'Retail' ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT merchant_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_details GROUP BY merchant_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM merchant_details WHERE merchant_type = 'Retail' ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;

SELECT td.transaction_id, td.amount, md.merchant_location FROM transaction_details td JOIN merchant_details md ON td.merchant_name = md.merchant_name WHERE td.amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY td.transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchant_information ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_status FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'successful';
SELECT merchant_name, merchant_location FROM merchant_information WHERE merchant_location = 'New York';
SELECT history_id, transaction_id, transaction_status, transaction_notes FROM transaction_history ORDER BY history_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_details WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_status, transaction_notes FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'Pending' AND history_id > 100 ORDER BY history_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM merchant_information WHERE merchant_location = 'New York' ORDER BY merchant_name ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, m.merchant_location FROM transaction_details t JOIN merchant_information m ON t.merchant_name = m.merchant_name ORDER BY t.transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT merchant_name, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM merchant_details WHERE merchant_location LIKE '%USA%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT type_name, status_name FROM transaction_type JOIN transaction_status ON transaction_type.type_id = transaction_status.status_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT merchant_name, amount FROM transaction_history JOIN merchant_details ON transaction_history.merchant_name = merchant_details.merchant_name WHERE merchant_location = 'New York';
SELECT DISTINCT merchant_name FROM transaction_history WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT type_name, status_name FROM transaction_type JOIN transaction_status ON transaction_type.type_id = transaction_status.status_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_name = 'Food';
SELECT tag_name, tag_description FROM transaction_tags WHERE tag_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date, merchant_name FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, tc.category_name, tt.tag_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.transaction_id = tc.category_id LEFT JOIN transaction_tags tt ON t.transaction_id = tt.tag_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, tp.partner_name, tl.log_description FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_partners tp ON t.transaction_id = tp.partner_id JOIN transaction_logs tl ON t.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id ORDER BY tl.log_date ASC;
